body.name: Jvcon Karaoke Microphone for Kids, Wireless Bluetooth Handheld Portable Singing Karaoke Mic Speaker with LED Lights Gift for Girls Boys Kids Children (Gold)
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Wednesday, February 21 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Tuesday, February 20. Order within 14 hrs 50 mins
features: 【Great Gift for Kids】The karaoke microphone for kids teens adults and an ideal gift for kinds of festivals like Christmas, Easter, Halloween, Thanksgiving and New Year.

【Quality Audio Sound & Funny Sound Changes】Professional audio processor and tuning system, the sound is loud enough. Long pressing the REC button to switch 5 different voices, include child, monster, original, male and female voice, will bring unlimited happiness to kids.

【5 in 1 Multifunctional Karaoke Microphone】Bluetooth wireless microphones can be used as microphone, speaker, loudspeaker, recorder, compatible with various singing applications. Mini home KTV for music playing and singing at any time.

【3 Connection Ways & LED Lights】Bluetooth, AUX Cable & TF Card connection. Just turn on device Bluetooth function, then turn on the mic, the bluetooth mic will automatically connect. Equipped with LED lights jump along with the rhythm of the music, adding atmosphere to your singing and parties!

【Long Palying Time】Built-in High-capacity rechargeable battery, this portable handheld Karaoke Microphone can last more than 5-6 hours after a fully charge. Anything and anytime, feel free to contact us.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Wide Compatibility Bluetooth Connection, Aux Cable, USB/TF Card Connection. The karaoke microphone can work with most devices including Android iOS smart-phones, PC, laptops and APP etc. 360° Surround HIFI Sound Karaoke microphone uses 360° surround sound technology, which can realize the spread and surround feeling of music in all aspects, bringing more immersive music enjoyment. Funny Sound Changes Long pressing the REC button will switch between 5 different voices, namely male voice, female voice, child voice, monster voice and original voice, will bring unlimited happiness to kids.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 19, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars My son loves it
reviews.reviewText: This makes such a great gift for kids or adults. I got it for my 8 year old son and we both use it equally. The quality is great, it was shipped and received quickly.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 30, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great for kids!
reviews.reviewText: I got this karaoke microphone for my grandson for a Christmas gift and he has had quite a bit of fun with it. He really likes how you can change your voice when speaking into it and sound like something or someone else. It has Bluetooth capability to have the music and your voice come from the same speaker and it can use a TF card or aux. cable also. It even has lights that flash to the beat of the music and will last over 6 hours on a single charge. He has really enjoyed this product and I am glad that I decided to get one of these for him.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 4, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Fun toy for kids of all ages.
reviews.reviewText: This microphone was a big hit in our house. There are multiple sound effect settings and the microphone pairs easily with Bluetooth. My kids favorite setting was the one that produces an echo. The volume can be adjusted and it is plenty loud even when not turned all the way up. This karaoke microphone is small and easy to store after use.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 27, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great gift for ages 5-18 yrs. Sound quality is very good.
reviews.reviewText: His is a wireless microphone that will Bluetooth to a smart device and sing karoke.It has good sound quality and lots of volume. This has been a hit with grandkids, nieces, and nephews as well. They have all commented on the ease of connecting to smart device and there are tons of free karoke songs you can download and use free.The microphone is made durable and should last for a long time.It is rechargeable and has lasted a long time in between charges.This is a great gift for anyone who like to sing.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 18, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars HOURS of Fun!
reviews.reviewText: This microphone has provided literally HOURS of fun for my kiddos (with only a slight headache for the adults). It is very easy to use and has many fun, voice-changing options. I love that it has a charger instead of using batteries, and it stays charged for quite a while. The sound quality is good, but it needs to be close to the source in Bluetooth mode. My only complaint is that you can't turn off the flashing lights in karaoke mode.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 9, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Wireless Fun with LED Lights in Glamorous Gold
reviews.reviewText: The Jvcon Karaoke Microphone for Kids is a delightful gift option, especially for children who love to sing. In an eye-catching Gold color, this wireless Bluetooth handheld microphone adds a touch of glamour to every performance. The built-in LED lights enhance the fun factor, creating an exciting atmosphere for budding singers. This portable mic speaker is a perfect gift for girls and boys, providing hours of entertainment. While the Jvcon Karaoke Microphone is a hit for kids, individual preferences may vary, and some might have specific color or feature preferences. Overall, Jvcon delivers a fun and stylish karaoke experience for young music enthusiasts.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 28, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very popular with the kids!
reviews.reviewText: I got two different products of this type to see if they would keep the kids entertained during the holidays. This one was definitely very popular, and a lot of fun. It was definitely a hit, at both Thanksgiving and Christmas, and I wouldn’t be surprised if the adults Decided to have a go at it on New Year’s Eve. I didn’t have high expectations for this, because the price is very reasonable. I am pleasantly surprised, and I’m giving it five stars.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 26, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Fun toy for everyone
reviews.reviewText: This microphone has some weight to it, and is difficult for younger kids to hold. But they didn't mind because the voice changer, echo and karaoke effect keep them occupied long enough. Makes an excellent gift for anyone.
